title: Sidekick Sales Launch Enablement
description: Comprehensive launch training for Sidekick Sales covering what it is, how it works, competitive positioning, go-to-market strategy, and available sales assets. Learn how to position Sidekick Sales as a solution that turns every conversation into an opportunity for revenue.
keyTakeaways: Setup takes less than 20 minutes‚Äîpoint Sidekick at a website URL, no product catalog integration required. Completely agnostic to e-commerce platform.
Web content (text, images, PDFs) pulled dynamically in real-time from product pages to inform customer conversations.
Single touchpoint for service and sales creates a better customer experience‚Äîone bot, one continuous conversation with the brand.
Competitive positioning: fastest launch time, unified service + sales, and customer context that competitors lack.
Focus on customer service leaders now; e-commerce buyer persona unlocks in early October with revenue tracking and enhanced chat.
Proof point: Tokomas achieved 55% resolution rate for product questions with Sidekick Sales.
actionItems: **Lead with time to value:** "Set up and live in under 20 minutes" is a powerful differentiator vs. competitors requiring catalog integration.
**Address the e-commerce threat:** E-commerce teams are evaluating AI sales agents. Position Gladly as the solution that keeps you in the conversation.
**Use the 55% stat:** Tokomas achieved 55% resolution rate for product questions‚Äîreal proof the solution works.
Don't promise revenue tracking yet‚Äîit's coming but not available today.
Don't demo the enhanced chat experience until it's in your demo environment.
Don't position against competitors by name in initial conversations.

contentBlocks.title: Overview
contentBlocks.content:
What It Is ‚Äî Sidekick Sales is GA‚Äîa new set of use cases for Sidekick focused on converting hesitant shoppers and increasing AOV without discounting.
Who It's For ‚Äî Sales, SC, and CS teams positioning to customer service leaders (now) and e-commerce leaders (October+).
Key Outcome ‚Äî Understand how to position Sidekick Sales and leverage available assets to start customer conversations.
Time to Value ‚Äî Customers can be live in production in less than 20 minutes‚Äîno product catalog integration required.

contentBlocks.title: Positioning & Messaging
contentBlocks.content: The Command of the Message Guide provides complete positioning for customer conversations, including the problem statement, solution framing, and key differentiators. The Messaging Brief covers how to communicate Sidekick Sales externally across all channels.

contentBlocks.title: Competitive Landscape
contentBlocks.content: Competitors fall into four buckets: AI shopping assistants (Big Su, LivePerson), AI agents for service (Sierra, Decagon), support suites (Zendesk, Kustomer), and product discovery widgets (Nosto, Dynamic Yield). Our wins: fastest launch, unified experience, and customer context.

faqs.question: Is it agnostic to commerce platforms?
faqs.answer: Yes‚Äîwe pull publicly available content from web pages. Works with Shopify, Salesforce Commerce, Adobe, or any platform.

faqs.question: What about inventory availability?
faqs.answer: Start with website content, add API integrations for real-time inventory if needed. It's additive, not required.

faqs.question: Does this work with Sidekick Standalone?
faqs.answer: Yes‚Äîall Sidekick enhancements including enhanced chat features can be leveraged within Standalone.

faqs.question: When can we demo the enhanced chat?
faqs.answer: Expect it in demo environments within a few weeks. Don't demo until it's available in your environment.
